name: Interpreter Pattern
description: Implement a simple interpreter for a mini-language. Commands: 'SET x 5' (set variable), 'ADD x 3' (add to variable), 'PRINT x' (output value). Return a dictionary of all PRINTed values as {variable: value}.
hints: Parse each line, maintain a variable dictionary. The interpreter pattern defines a grammar and interprets sentences in that language.

tests.name: Add
tests.description: SET x 5, ADD x 3, PRINT x -> {x: 8}
